entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Seoul Exorcist 1111: Roguelite
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫199,99 [‚Ç∫40,00 ~ ‚Ç∫299,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫199,99

In-App Purchases

  • 200,000 x CoinsÔºö‚Ç∫499,99
  • 80,000 x CoinsÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • 40,000 x CoinsÔºö‚Ç∫149,99
  • 10,000 x CoinsÔºö‚Ç∫49,99

Application Description

Think Fast, Strike Faster! As the ultimate exorcist, choose your attacks wisely, upgrade combat deck, combine traits and items, and save the cursed souls‚Äîbefore death finds you. ‚ñ™ Real-Time Turn-Based Combat Enemies react the moment you make a decision‚Äî! Fast, tense action with every move. ‚ñ™ 4 Characters with Unique Strategies Each with 8 uniques attack types, exclusive animations, and 2 passive traits. Adapt your playstyle for every run. ‚ñ™ Time Limit - Think Fast, Strike Faster! You have just 7 minutes to defeat all enemies in each run. You've been relentlessly trained for this moment. ‚ñ™ Item & Trait Combinations Strategic synergies that activate automatically during battle. Timing and adaptability are the keys to victory! ‚ñ™ Roguelite Clear all 7 maps and the boss in a single run‚Äîor get reset! But clearing the same map 3 times unlocks progress. Collect coins, build a stronger deck, and dive back in! ‚ñ™ 12 Languages Supported ‚Ä®Korean, English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Brazilian Portuguese, and Russian. ‚ñ™ Offline Game All data is stored locally. No network required. Be Aware. Uninstalling the app will erase saved data. ‚ñ™Discord https://discord.gg/UaZApdWG93 ‚ñ™For inquires / bug report snowgames0629@gmail.com

entry.title: FoodyLife: The Food Diary App
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫99,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

You will be able to explore your eating habits visually and improve your eating habits. No calories and no numbers are shown in the app! Features: + Beautifully minimalist food diary app + In-App Camera And Filter + No calories No Pressure + Visualizes all your diets and shows your diet balance clearly! + Crazy and Interactive Foody Face + Learn how to eat mindfully and correctly right now! Don‚Äôt make Foody Face angry! Tap download right now! ---------- The inspiration behind FoodyLife is that nowadays people pay little attention to what they eat and often eat unhealthy food. Although there are many similar apps on the market (e.g. Fitness App, Calorie counter...), most of them focus mainly on ‚Äúnumbers‚Äù, such as how many calories the user has eaten and how long the user should exercise to get rid of those calories, or sending the user notifications when they should get up to exercise or if they have eaten too much. FoodyLife‚Äô is an app that helps users track their daily diet by allowing them to keep their own food diary. The app shows neither calories nor numbers; instead, users have only to take a picture, enter their diet information, then they are able their overall diet balance. It is very simple and highly effective. Users can explore their eating habits visually, improving self-consciousness about eating habits.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Afterplace
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫399,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫49,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫399,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫49,99

Application Description

An open world adventure game filled with silly characters and terrible secrets. Afterplace is an adventurous indie game for mobile devices. It's a huge open world, full of hidden secrets, treasures, and creatures. You'll run around the woods, fight monsters, and talk to ostensibly shady characters! All from your pocket! Be warned though - you never know what the forest might be hiding, and not all trails are paved. Labyrinths and dungeons are tucked away in the most concealed nooks. There are no waypoints in Afterplace. You'll have to forge your own path. Afterplace has been designed from the ground up to be a fast, fluid, beautiful experience for mobile. There are no virtual buttons. You can move and attack by touching anywhere. You can tap objects directly to interact or attack, use two thumbs like a traditional controller, or control the game with a physical gamepad. The game will adapt dynamically to your play style. Pick up and set down the game at your own pace, it will always save your progress. Afterplace is made to feel like a full-fledged indie adventure game that fits in your pocket. About the Author: Afterplace is made by one person, Evan Kice. A former software engineer from Austin TX, Evan quit his job (to the dismay of his friends and family) and has been working full time on Afterplace since early 2019. The initial game released in December of 2022, but Evan plans on continuing to support and polish the game when he can!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Cluedo
entry.summary:
Whispering Pines Bundle: ‚Ç∫699,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫249,99
Black Adder Resort Bundle: ‚Ç∫699,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫249,99
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Whispering Pines BundleÔºö‚Ç∫699,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫249,99 [‚Ç∫249,99 ~ ‚Ç∫699,99]
  • Black Adder Resort BundleÔºö‚Ç∫699,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫249,99 [‚Ç∫249,99 ~ ‚Ç∫699,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫34,99

In-App Purchases

  • Suspects BundleÔºö‚Ç∫1.499,99
  • Ultimate EditionÔºö‚Ç∫1.999,99
  • PolarStation Crime SceneBundleÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Whispering Pines BundleÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Black Adder Resort BundleÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Epic Crime Collection contentÔºö‚Ç∫999,99
  • Noir Character PackÔºö‚Ç∫399,99
  • Noir Crime Scene PlumÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Noir Crime Scene PeacockÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Noir Crime Scene LocationÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

Join fellow detectives all over the world in the official digital board game version of Clue/Cluedo! Gather crucial evidence, interrogate suspects and solve the original murder mystery. Follow Miss Scarlett, Colonel Mustard, Professor Plum, Chef White, Solicitor Peacock and Mayor Green through the iconic Tudor Mansion, unlocking their motives and alibis as you go. Enjoy Clue/Cluedo the way you remember it in Classic Mode, or jump in for a quick game with Clue Cards mode. Alternatively, if you want to really test your sleuthing skills, try a new investigation format available exclusively to Clue/Cluedo ‚Äì Ultimate Detective. In Ultimate Detective Mode, everyone answers suggestions at the same time‚Ä¶but secretly! Face your suspects in a direct interrogation as you rely on your skills of deduction to get to the truth. Experience the mystery, solve the murder and become a top-tier detective! HOW TO PLAY CLUE/CLUEDO: 1. Three cards are dealt face-down and set aside ‚Äì this is the solution to the crime! 2. Everyone is dealt three Clue Cards. These are automatically crossed off your clue sheet, as they can‚Äôt be part of the solution. 3. Roll the dice and move around the board. 4. When you enter a room, you can make a suggestion ‚Äì select who you think the murderer is, what weapon they used and where the crime happened. 5. Other players will then aim to disprove your suggestion; if one of your suggestions matches a card in their hand, they show you that card to disprove it. 6. Use your clue sheet to keep track of which characters, weapons and rooms have been disproven. 7. Think you‚Äôve figured it out? It‚Äôs time to make an accusation! Be careful though ‚Äì if you‚Äôre right, you win, but if you are wrong, you‚Äôre out! FEATURES - THE CLASSIC TUDOR MANSION ‚Äì Play the beloved original board game, now rendered in stunning 3D animation and entirely ad-free! - A BRAND-NEW GAME MODE ‚Äì Exclusive to the digital version of Clue/Cluedo, Ultimate Detective Mode lets you interrogate multiple characters at once. - MULTIPLE MODES ‚Äì Compete against cutting-edge AI opponents that adapt to your skill level for the perfect game, or challenge detectives around the world. - ADDITIONAL ORIGINAL CONTENT ‚Äì What happened after the shocking events of Tudor Mansion? Find out in a series of original new crime scenes designed specifically for the digital version of Clue/Cluedo! New characters emerge, bringing with them new clues, motives and case files to consider as you travel around the world in search of the truth. Sharpen your mind with the iconic murder-mystery board game, now available on mobile!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Neo Monsters
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫49,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫49,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • 13 GemsÔºö‚Ç∫399,99
  • 1 GemÔºö‚Ç∫49,99
  • 6 GemsÔºö‚Ç∫199,99
  • 48 GemsÔºö‚Ç∫1.499,99
  • 74 GemsÔºö‚Ç∫2.299,99
  • 150 GemsÔºö‚Ç∫3.999,99
  • 28 GemsÔºö‚Ç∫799,99

Application Description

Become a Legend! Capture over 2000 Animated Monsters and Duel in Real-Time PvP! Form your team and battle for victory! Capture, train, and evolve to become the champion in one of the biggest monster battling RPGs! Neo Monsters is an addictive strategy RPG that features epic 4v4 battles between two teams of up to 16 monsters. The unique turn-based battle system allows you to come up with powerful chain strategies by combining hundreds of abilities. Hunt down the strongest monsters and harness their power, then take the battle online to dominate in exciting PvP battles and leagues! Are you ready to take the challenge? ‚ñ∂Features: ‚óè Build your Monster Collection ‚Ä¢ Capture and evolve over 1000 fully animated monsters! ‚Ä¢ Train your monsters and unleash their deadly potential. ‚Ä¢ Collect evolution ingredients to create the ultimate power! ‚óè Form a Battle Strategy ‚Ä¢ Build the ultimate team of up to 16 monsters. ‚Ä¢ Defeat your opponents in epic turn-based 4v4 battles! ‚Ä¢ Create devastating combinations from hundreds of abilities. ‚óè Become the Champion ‚Ä¢ Conquer six Leagues and take on the Grand Champion in 60+ hours of adventure! ‚Ä¢ Explore multiple islands and dungeons on your journey. ‚Ä¢ Follow the story to uncover the truth behind your late uncle‚Äôs atrocity. ‚óè Take the Battle Online ‚Ä¢ Duel players from around the world in PvP leagues! ‚Ä¢ Complete 100+ online missions. ‚Ä¢ Take on weekly updated events to unlock big rewards. Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NeoMonstersOfficial/ Join the Neo Monsters community: http://www.neomonstersforum.com/ Issues or questions? Contact our support: neomonsupport.gameplay@zigzagame.net Terms of Service: https://www.zigzagame.com/terms/ Privacy Policy: https://www.zigzagame.com/privacy-policy/
